title: Expose stable Ingest API (batch/stream)
body:
**Description**
Stabilize /ingest/batch and streaming topics (ingest.*) for Maestro.

**AC**
- [ ] JSON schema versioned
- [ ] Idempotency keys
- [ ] Signed requests validated

**DoD**
- [ ] API docs published
- [ ] Contract tests green in CI

title: Claims/Provenance API endpoint
body:
**AC**
- [ ] POST /claims/register stores receipts and links to cases
- [ ] AuthZ via PDP

title: Export/Disclosure API for packager
body:
**AC**
- [ ] Request export bundle with hash manifests
- [ ] Verify receipts on import

title: UI: show Maestro run link on case/audit views
body:
**AC**
- [ ] Correlation ID renders as deep link to Maestro run
- [ ] Permission‑checked

title: UI: surface provenance receipts
body:
**AC**
- [ ] Download/view receipt JSON
- [ ] Verify indicator shows valid signature

title: SIG observability: link traces to Maestro
body:
**AC**
- [ ] Propagate trace/span IDs
- [ ] Dashboard panels for cross‑system flows

title: Allow‑listed runbook triggers (SIG → Maestro)
body:
**AC**
- [ ] Trigger button visible per policy
- [ ] Audit log with purpose/authority

title: Demo/seed integration with Maestro runbooks
body:
**AC**
- [ ] Seeded datasets load via runbook
- [ ] Reset script available

title: SIG CI: enforce Maestro contract tests
body:
**AC**
- [ ] CI job runs against Maestro mock
- [ ] Fail on breaking changes
